aim.short: Sacrifice movement for +1 die on a ranged attack.
aim.long: This unit may sacrifice movement to gain +1 die on its next ranged attack. Declare before rolling.

ambush.short: Deploy hidden; gain first strike when revealed.
ambush.long: May deploy hidden. Reveal at any time to gain first strike in melee.

anchor.short: Cannot be moved by enemy effects.
anchor.long: This unit cannot be moved by enemy abilities or effects. Ignores knockback and displacement.

assistant.long: May assist an adjacent Mystic or Scientist with special activations or effects, as defined on the unit card.

audio_suppression.long: This unit is immune to sound-based abilities, fear effects, and sonic attacks unless explicitly stated otherwise.

armored.short: Ignore the first point of damage from attacks.
armored.long: The first point of damage this unit would take from an attack is ignored. Does not apply to automatic damage unless stated.
